pluggable.name: Last.fm Recent Tracks
pluggable.author: Scott Merrill
pluggable.description: Retrieves recently played track names from last.fm

help.value:
There are two ways to use this plugin:

  1. Legacy Method:

    Configure as you would a normal plugin, then use <?php $theme->lastrecent(); ?> in your theme where you would like the Last.fm list of tracks to appear.

  2. Blocks:

    Add the block to the appropriate area in your theme and configure as you would a normal block
